CustomField.description: BODEV-1100: Mark UserGem Leads as Tier 1 prospects based on the current Lead info BODEV-1192: Replaced with a manual checkbox field so that RingLead can manage it.
CustomField.formula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "UserGems" ),
CASE( TEXT( Region__c ), "Northern Europe", 1, "DACH", 1, "UK", 1, "Southern Europe", 1, "US/CA", 1, 0 ) = 1,
Industry_ICP__c,
cbit_Employees__c > 49,
OR( NOT(ISBLANK( UG_Past_Contact_Role__c ) ),
AND( CASE( TEXT( Seniority__c ), "Executive", 1, "Director", 1, "Manager", 1, "", 1, 0 ) = 1,
CASE( TEXT( Job_Area_New__c ), "DAM Management", 1, "Brand", 1, "Digital", 1, "Communications", 1, "Marketing General", 1, "Creative", 1, "IT/ICT", 1, "", 1, 0 ) = 1 ) ),
UG_Days_b_w_Past_Cont_Start_Move__c >= 90
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Mark UserGem Leads as Tier 1 prospects based on the current Lead info (Lead Source, Region, Industry ICP, Employees, Seniority, Job Area - New, UG - Past Contact Role, UG - Days b/w Past Cont. Start & Move)
CustomField.label: [Dep] UG - Tier 1
